description: Try our easy to follow Mussels with Tomato & Chilli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mussels with Tomato & Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 405g diced tomatoes with basil and oregano

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep pan. Add onion and garlic and cook gently over low heat for 2-3 minutes. Add white wine and bring to the boil. Simmer for 3 minutes.
Add tomato, tomato paste, chilli flakes and sugar. Stir well and bring to the boil. Add mussels to pan. Cover with a lid and cook for a few minutes over a high heat, shaking pan occasionally.
Remove lid and using a slotted spoon, remove mussels as soon as they open and place in a serving dish. Discard any mussels that do not open.
Remove pan from heat, add parsley and stir well.
Pour sauce over mussels and serve immediately with crusty bread.
